Class Moves

  • java.lang.Object
    • Moves
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Acrobatics, AerialAce, AncientPower, AuraSphere, Blizzard, BodySlam, BrickBreak, BugBuzz, Crunch, DarkPulse, DragonClaw, DragonPulse, Earthquake, EnergyBall, FirePunch, Flamethrower, FlashCanon, FocusBlast, HydroPump, IceBeam, IcePunch, IronHead, KnockOff, Megahorn, PoisonJab, PowerWhip, PsychicMove, Return, RockSlide, ShadowBall, ShadowClaw, SignalBeam, SludgeBomb, Thunder, Thunderbolt, ThunderPunch, Waterfall, WingAttack, XScissor, ZenHeadbutt

    public class Moves
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the super class for all the pokemon's moves
    Author:
    Miguel Habana
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

             int p,
             int a,
             int mPP,

             java.lang.String t,

        Constructor that allows for alteration of the name power, accuracy, pp details, type, and kind of attack
        Parameters:
        n - name of the move
        p - power of the move
        a - accuracy of the move
        mPP - maximum PP of the move
        rPP - remaining PP of the move
        t - type of the move
        k - kind of attack
